title: SJVN generates 8489 MU power in FY24: CMD
description: State-owned SJVN generated 8,489 million units of green energy from its hydro, solar, and wind power stations in 2023-24. Despite challenging conditions due to climate change, the company set new records in daily and monthly generation. SJVN reported standalone revenue of Rs 2,533.59 crore and a profit after tax of Rs 908.40 crore for the year.
